Hero.title: Bringing Healthcare Closer to Every Village
Hero.subtitle: Powered by AI-driven disease tracking, our platform predicts medicine demand, keeps pharmacies stocked with essential drugs, enables video consultations, and ensures rural families get timely treatment without financial or travel burdens.

SymptomAnalysis.subtitle: Quickly understand your symptoms with our AI-powered analysis tool, powered by Gemini. Simply enter your details, and get reliable, data-driven insights to guide your next steps. Our system helps you identify possible conditions early, supporting better decisions for your health and ensuring timely medical attention when needed.
SymptomAnalysis.formSubtitle: Kindly be precise about your problems.

ChatWithAi.subtitle: Discuss your health concerns instantly with our AI-driven medical assistant. Get personalized, reliable insights into symptoms, possible conditions, and care recommendations—all in your language. While not a replacement for doctors, this tool empowers you with knowledge, enabling better decisions and guiding you toward the right medical support when needed.

Step2.title: Lifestyle
Step2.diet: Describe your typical diet (e.g., vegetarian, balanced, etc.).

Step3.title: Medical History
Step3.chronic: Do you have any chronic conditions? If yes, please specify.
Step3.medications: Are you currently taking any medications?
Step3.allergies: Do you have any known allergies?

Step4.title: General Health
Step4.sleep: How would you describe your sleep quality or hours per night?
Step4.energy: How are your energy levels throughout the day?
Step4.digestion: Do you experience any digestion issues? (e.g., bloating, acidity)

Step5.title: Symptoms
Step5.symptoms: Please describe any symptoms you are currently experiencing.

Step7.title: Review
Step7.reviewNote: Please review all the information carefully before submission.
